post:
We at hosteons.com have a special promo for 3 of our locations - LA, NY and Dallas (Not applicable on other locations) :

Free upgrade to 10Gbps Port (Shared) Speed no coupon code needed. (This promo is only valid till 30th June 2021). To get your free upgrade, just mention the order number in this thread.

Free Native /64 IPv6 with all VPS
Full RDNS Access via VPS Control Panel
Custom ISO Upload available in VPS control panel.
Just order any of our KVM VPS in LA or New York or Dallas

Network Looking Glass:
Network Looking Glass for LA – https://lg.la.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for NY – https://lg.ny.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for Dallas - https://lg.dal.hosteons.com

VPS Nodes CPU are - Dual Intel E5 - 26xx, with RAID 10 SSD


Gigabit VPS: (Free upgrade to 10Gbps with this promo)

Other Free Goodies:

1) Free Blesta License 
2) Free Windows 2019 License on annual payments (Applicable on Gigabit VPS 3 and higher packages as it's minimum requirement to run Windows) or you don't want to pay annually, just pay a one time setup fees of $25 for Windows 2019 License and you can get your Windows License even on monthly payments.
3) Free Network Port upgrade to 10 Gbps

24x7 Support

All popular modes (Credit Card, PayPal, AliPay) of payments including cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin / Bitcoin Cash / Dai / Ethereum / Litecoin / USD Coin are accepted

If any queries feel free to contact us via our support ticket at https://my.hosteons.com
